issue.title: [CF 335] about ICD options
issue.body:
Druid said he need one option for Nature's Grace, beacuse if Eclipse (Lunar) or Eclipse (Solar) is applied will reset the Nature's Grace cooldown to 0.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #335 | Raw

comments.body:
If you track the cooldown of it as a unit cooldown, it will track resets in the cooldown of it from eclipse changes. I need to make this more apparent somehow, or do some rewriting so that ICD icons will track this too.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I only track the ICD. In fact, i try every ideas to setup that ICD, i think it need a option same like Early Frost, maybe only these two spells are different in ICD.

Edited Nov 6, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I added a help popup when trying to track NG as an ICD, advising you to change the icon type to a unit cooldown instead of an internal cooldown so that the cooldown resets will properly be tracked.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
